title: Lamb.of.God-New.American.Gospel[2000][MP3][128Kbps]-Magik
description:
Lamb of God - New American Gospel [2000]
========================================

Released: September 26, 2000
Recorded: April 15?April 22, 2000
Genre:    Death Metal
Length:   55:29
Label:    Metal Blade
Producer: Steve Austin

Track listing:
==============

   1. Black Label ? 4:53
   2. A Warning ? 2:24
   3. In the Absence of the Sacred ? 4:36
   4. Letter to the Unborn ? 2:56
   5. The Black Dahlia ? 3:19
   6. Terror and Hubris in the House of Frank Pollard ? 5:38
   7. The Subtle Arts of Murder and Persuasion ? 4:10
   8. Pariah ? 4:24
   9. Confessional ? 4:01
  10. O.D.H.G.A.B.F.E. ? 5:15


New American Gospel is the debut album of Virginian metal band Lamb of God, released in 2000. New American Gospel was the first release with Willie Adler on guitar.
